Have you checked whether there is a Cactus mailing list? This question
sounds like it would be better taken there. I'm glad to hear that the
JUnit part of your efforts is going well though. Welcome to the
community.

Simon

On Sat, Jun 21, 2008 at 4:21 AM, Nishant Karve <mystudygroup@...> wrote:
> Hello Experts,
> I am new to junit/cactus. I have configured the framework to write
> JUnit/Cactus test cases. However I can work very well with JUnit, But when I
> am trying to run cactus test case I am getting following error:
> org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpRecoverableException: Error in parsing the
> status line from the response: unable to find line starting with "HTTP"
> Please find attached 'doc' which describes this error in detail. It's very
> difficult to come out of this exception. Please help.
> Thanks in advance,
> Nishant...
